channel.title: How to Play N64 Roms WARNING!: Lots of pictures! :D
channel.description:
[ul][center][u][b]How To Play N64 Roms[/b][/u][/center]
[u]Things You Will Need[/u] [list] [li]Project 64 - [url=http://www.emulator-zone.com/download.php/emulators/n64/project64/project64_1.6.exe]Download Link[/url][/li] [li]N64 Roms - [url=http://www.blitzmodz.com/n64roms/]Link to list[/url][/li] [li]Ability to Follow This Tutorial[/li] [/list]
[u]Installing Project 64[/u] [list] [li]Double Click on The icon on your desktop (if you dled with FireFox) [img]http://img61.imageshack.us/img61/6642/step1bn1.png[/img][/li] [li] Click Next > [IMG]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/3327/step2ku5.png[/img][/li] [li] Click Next > again [IMG]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/7404/step3ie2.png[/img][/li] [li] Click Install [IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/3920/step4dx7.png[/img] [list][li] Click Finish [IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/7817/step5sk6.png[/img][/li] [li]Congrats, you have just installed Project 64[/li] [/list]
[u]How to Play ROMs[/u] [list] [li]First download a Rom ( I am using Mortal Kombat as an example) [IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/2148/step6do7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img103.imageshack.us/img103/6233/step7wg0.png[/img] [/li] [li]Then open up Project64 (It should be in your start menu)[/li] [li] Then Open up a Rom.
[IMG]http://img371.imageshack.us/img371/9749/step8ee4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/4955/step9aj1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/6249/step10gx1.png[/img][/li] [/list]
[center][b][u]CONGRATS, YOU HAVE INSTALLED AND PLAYED A ROM ON PROJECT64~!!!!!~!~![/u][/b][/center] [/list]
[center][u][b]Links to Rom Sites[/b][/u][/center] [list] [li] [url=http://romhustler.net/roms/n64/all]Romhustler[/url] [/li] [li] [url=http://www.coolrom.com/roms/n64/]CoolRom[/url] [/li] [li] [url=http://www.emuparadise.org/roms/n64/]Emuparadise.org[/url] - thanks extreme300 [/li] [li] Post if you have any more Rom sites [/li][/list]
[center][u][b]How to play[/b][/u][/center] [list] [li]Go to [url=http://"http://www.mameworld.net/easyemu/pj64guide.htm"]This[/url] site (thanks ron :D) and read about how to use the controls.[/li] [/list][/ul]

Link now works

EDIT: BTW, 3.65kilos, can’t due a tutorial on Project64k right now as I don’t have access to a XP computer and Project64k isn’t compatible with Vista yet. I could do a tutorial on Mupen64k though if you want.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2007, 01:06:43 PM[/size][hr]I’ll take your silence as a yes, 3.65kilos!

item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Your video card doesn’t support the graphics plugin. I suggest downloading this graphics plugin pack and testing each one to find out what works best for you.(remember to put the .dll’s in the plugins folder)

EDIT: Hey ghostboy, you should make a tut on how to use project64k. It’s project64 with integrated kaillera so you can play multiplayer with people over the internet.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

wyn10:

i still dont see what the controls are!!!

Controls are at the bottom of the first post in this topic. Well…They used to be.

Refer to this manual: http://www.mameworld.net/easyemu/pj64guide.htm

There are different plugins you an install to set the controls or get better controls. So that link should be useful. Ghostboy, if you like the link, add it to the tutorial please.

Read full topic

ok sorry was busy, ok, in project 64, under options, there is an option called configure controller plugin, click on that and you’ve goten to the controls
